tool_description:
Best Instagram Scraper & Downloader 2024
● Priority Support (t.me/mrngstar_rapid)
● Download HD stories, highlights, reels, posts, profiles, reel audios (no-CORS media)
● 100% real-time data for user posts, user info, hashtag, reels & many more
name: Instagram Bulk Scraper Latest
title: Instagram Bulk Scraper Latest

api_list.name: Get user info by user_id
api_list.description: User info from user ID

optional_parameters.name: cache
optional_parameters.description: Use this query parameter to get fresh data on every request.

api_list.name: Get user info by username(Basic)
api_list.description: Fetch user_id(pk) & other basic details by using username.

optional_parameters.name: cache
optional_parameters.description: Use this query parameter to get fresh data on every request.

api_list.name: Get user info by username (user posts & related users)
api_list.description:
Get brief info about an Instagram user by username.
Along with users info you will get **user posts** & related users data here.

`Get user info by username(Basic) endpoint for fast response`
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com/webget_user_info/googleindia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com/webget_user_info/{username}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Audio Details
api_list.description: Get Audio Reels, Audio Info and media count by Audio ID

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get user tag posts by user_id
api_list.description:
Get user tag posts of an Instagram user using user_id.
User tag posts can be found at *www. instagram .com/{username}/tagged/*

optional_parameters.name: end_cursor
optional_parameters.description: pass `end_cursor` from previous response to get more posts.

optional_parameters.name: nocors
optional_parameters.description: if set to true, you will get no-CORS media urls

api_list.name: Hashtag Posts
api_list.description: Get hashtag recent & top posts.

optional_parameters.name: nocors
optional_parameters.description: if set to true, you will get no-CORS media urls

optional_parameters.name: feed_type
optional_parameters.description: feed_type must be **recent** or **top**. By default feed_type is **recent**.

api_list.name: Get user posts by user_id v2
api_list.description:
Get posts of an Instagram user using user_id. 

**play_count** is supported for videos.

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Count must be between 1-15. Default count value is 12.

optional_parameters.name: nocors
optional_parameters.description: if set to true, you will get no-CORS media urls

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Use `next_max_id` from response to fetch more posts

api_list.name: Get User Reels by user ID
api_list.description:
Get reels of an Instagram user using user_id. 
Pagination is supported using max_id

optional_parameters.name: nocors
optional_parameters.description: if set to true, you will get no-CORS media urls

optional_parameters.name: max_id
optional_parameters.description: Leave `max_id` empty for first request then provide `max_id` received from previous request to get more items.

api_list.name: Get user posts by user_id
api_list.description: Get posts of an Instagram user using user_id.

optional_parameters.name: end_cursor
optional_parameters.description: Use **end_cursor** from response to fetch more posts

optional_parameters.name: count
optional_parameters.description: Count must be between 1-30. Default count value is 12.

optional_parameters.name: nocors
optional_parameters.description: if set to true, you will get no-CORS media urls

api_list.name: Get media(post, reel & other) info by shortcode
api_list.description:
Get brief media (post, reel & other) info by shortcode.

`Use V2 endpoint for fast response`

required_parameters.name: shortcode

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com/webmedia_info_from_shortcode/Ctw1wHuy95X"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com/webmedia_info_from_shortcode/{shortcode}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "instagram-bulk-scraper-latest.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get media(post, reel & other) info by shortcode v2
api_list.description:

You will also get comments, `video_play_count`, etc in the response.
